item.title: ! help i cant make my self mod!
item.dc:creator: @tillj005 tillj005
item.description:
@tillj005 wrote:

im using TestScape source and i have this in my client.Java

[code]

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“modjt”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

		if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);		// "This world is full."[/code]

Read full topic
